name: Hotel Weisses Kreuz

reviews.title: Couldn't do any Better than this
reviews.text: Bear in mind that this is a very very old building, and in the heart of the old town. There is a lift, and lots of stairs - but we wouldn't change anything.

reviews.title: Room at the Back
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights in late October 2005. Unfortunately the lift was under repairs, and we were 4 flights up! However the hotel had prewarned us - and offered up front a 20% discount. We would have stayed anyway - but it was great to have advanced notice.

reviews.title: Haunted??
reviews.text: Location: 2nd to none. Faces onto the same street as the Golden Roof. If you are quick in the morning, you can even sit in the alcove and look at the Roof while you eat your breakfast!

reviews.title: Loved it
reviews.text: Staff delightful. We left behind a small stuffed toy - precious to our daughter - which they kept safe and posted home.

description: Tyrolean inn; views of the Nordkette mountain range; near the Gothic Arcades & the Golden Roof.
